title: [Self-Directed] Parallel Learning Framework Design for Solving Nonlinear System Zero-Sum Games

context.prior_knowledge: Optimal control theory, reinforcement learning fundamentals, nonlinear system modeling, value iteration algorithm (VI) comprehension
context.additional_context: Advanced research course where experts in medical, legal, and technical fields apply game-theoretic approaches to real-world problem-solving

learning_goals: Derive optimal policies in zero-sum games of nonlinear systems using a parallel learning framework.
Improve the exploration policy of a value iteration algorithm to enhance learning convergence speed by 30% or more.
Implement and verify a dichotomous value iteration (DV) algorithm in a project based on real-world cases.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
